      • Event

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public Date getDate()
        Returns the date the event happened. Keep in mind this might be and approximate date, or not all fields may actually be known. Also, it is recommended to get the formatted date string from getDateString() rather than just formatting the date this method returns, since getDateString() takes into account the boolean attributes.
        Returns:
        the date the event happened
        See Also:
        getDateString(), isYearKnown(), isMonthKnown(), isDayKnown(), isAbout()

      • setDate

        public void setDate(Date date)
        Set the date the event happened. Keep in mind this might be and approximate date, or not all fields may actually be known, so set the other fields accordingly.
        Parameters:
        date - the date the event happened
        See Also:
        setYearKnown(boolean), setMonthKnown(boolean), setDayKnown(boolean), setAbout(boolean)

      • getPlace

        public Place getPlace()
        Returns the place this event happened. This event also happened in all regions of this place.
        Returns:
        the place this event happened
        See Also:
        Place.getRegion(), Place.getPlaces()

      • setPlace

        public void setPlace(Place place)
        Sets the place this event happened. This event also happened in all regions of this place.
        Parameters:
        place - the place this event happened

      • isYearKnown

        public boolean isYearKnown()
        Returns true if the year is known. Sometimes not all information about the date of an event is known.
        Returns:
        true if the year is known

      • setYearKnown

        public void setYearKnown(boolean yearKnown)
        Sets the year is known or not. Sometimes not all information about the date of an event is known.
        Parameters:
        yearKnown - whether the year is known or not

      • isAbout

        public boolean isAbout()
        Returns true if the date is just an approximate.
        Returns:
        true if the date is just an approximate

      • setAbout

        public void setAbout(boolean about)
        Set if the date is an approximate date.
        Parameters:
        about - if the date is an approximate date

      • isDayKnown

        public boolean isDayKnown()
        Returns true if the day is known. Sometimes not all information about the date of an event is known.
        Returns:
        true if the day is known

      • setDayKnown

        public void setDayKnown(boolean dayKnown)
        Sets the day is known or not. Sometimes not all information about the date of an event is known.
        Parameters:
        dayKnown - whether the day is known or not

      • isMonthKnown

        public boolean isMonthKnown()
        Returns true if the month is known. Sometimes not all information about the date of an event is known.
        Returns:
        true if the month is known

      • setMonthKnown

        public void setMonthKnown(boolean monthKnown)
        Sets the month is known or not. Sometimes not all information about the date of an event is known.
        Parameters:
        monthKnown - whether the month is known or not

      • getDateString

        public String getDateString()
        Constructs and returns the date string. This method is better than just formatting the value from getDate() since it takes into account the values from isMonthKnown(), isDayKnown(), isYearKnown(), and isAbout().
        Returns:
        the formatted date string
